channel.title: Quest tab
channel.description: How do i change what things say in a PI in the quest tab ? thanks alot , appreciate it :) ;D

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @RuneForge_RSPS RuneForge RSPS
item.description:
@RuneForge_RSPS wrote:

Seriously, calm down everyone.

Pro tip: search in your source a keyword that you want to change.

For instance, if you saw in your quest tab that it said dogs…
type dogs in the search option in the main folder of your source. Some java files will appear, open them up type cntrl + f to search, type dogs, then change it or remove it. If you don’t get any results, it’s most likely client sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:3, topic:427192”]Client sided RSInterface.java
here is mine public static void playerinfo(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface tab = addScreenInterface(26099); addSprite(26100, 7, "User/CUSTOM"); addHead2(26101, 50, 50, 1600); addText(26102, "", TDA, 2, 0x00FFFF, true, false); //Title of interface - Top Text addButton(26103, 8, "Equipment/CUSTOM", "Close"); addText(26104, "Time Online", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26105, "Total Kills", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26106, "Total Deaths", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26107, "Player Name", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26108, "Combat Level", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26109, "Rank", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26110, "", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 0); addText(26111, "Dung Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26112, "Activity Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26113, "Insid-P Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addButton(26114, 7, "User/Button", "Rest"); addText(26115, "Barrow Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26116, "Pest Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26117, "Assult Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true);[/quote]thanks appreciate it , other kids are mad atm… i just need help …

Read full topic

item.title: Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

Client sided RSInterface.java
here is mine public static void playerinfo(RSFont[] TDA) { RSInterface tab = addScreenInterface(26099); addSprite(26100, 7, "User/CUSTOM"); addHead2(26101, 50, 50, 1600); addText(26102, "", TDA, 2, 0x00FFFF, true, false); //Title of interface - Top Text addButton(26103, 8, "Equipment/CUSTOM", "Close"); addText(26104, "Time Online", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26105, "Total Kills", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26106, "Total Deaths", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26107, "Player Name", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26108, "Combat Level", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26109, "Rank", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 1); addText(26110, "", 0xff9b00, false, true, 38, TDA, 0); addText(26111, "Dung Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26112, "Activity Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26113, "Insid-P Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addButton(26114, 7, "User/Button", "Rest"); addText(26115, "Barrow Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26116, "Pest Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true); addText(26117, "Assult Points", TDA, 0, 0xff9b00, false, true);
